verses.verse: It happened in the eleventh <WH6249> year, <WH8141> in the first <WH259> day of the month, <WH2320> that the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> because Tyre <WH6865> has said <WH559> against Jerusalem, <WH3389> Aha, <WH1889> she is broken: <WH7665> the gate <WH1817> of the peoples; <WH5971> she is turned <WH5437> to me; <WH4390> I shall be replenished, now that she is laid waste: <WH2717>

therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH3069> Behold, <WH6865> I am against you, Tyre, and will cause many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> to come up <WH5927> against you, <WH3220> as the sea causes its waves <WH1530> to come up. <WH5927>

They shall destroy <WH7843> the walls <WH2346> of Tyre, <WH6865> and break down <WH2040> her towers: <WH4026> I will also scrape <WH5500> her dust <WH6083> from her, <WH5414> and make her a bare <WH6706> rock. <WH5553>

She shall be a place for the spreading <WH4894> of nets <WH2764> in the midst <WH8432> of the sea; <WH3220> for I have spoken <WH1696> it, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh; <WH3069> and she shall become a spoil <WH957> to the nations. <WH1471>
Her daughters <WH1323> who are in the field <WH7704> shall be slain <WH2026> with the sword: <WH2719> and they shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>

For thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Behold, <WH935> I will bring on Tyre <WH6865> Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> king <WH4428> of kings, <WH4428> from the north, <WH6828> with horses, <WH5483> and with chariots, <WH7393> and with horsemen, <WH6571> and a company, <WH6951> and many <WH7227> people. <WH5971>

He shall kill <WH2026> your daughters <WH1323> in the field <WH7704> with the sword; <WH2719> and he shall make <WH5414> forts <WH1785> against you, <WH8210> and cast up a mound <WH5550> against you, <WH6965> and raise up the buckler against you. <WH6793>
He shall set <WH5414> his battering <WH6904> engines <WH4239> against your walls, <WH2346> and with his axes <WH2719> he shall break down <WH5422> your towers. <WH4026>

By reason of the abundance <WH8229> of his horses <WH5483> their dust <WH80> shall cover <WH3680> you: <WH2346> your walls shall shake <WH7493> at the noise <WH6963> of the horsemen, <WH6571> and of the wagons, <WH1534> and of the chariots, <WH7393> when he shall enter <WH935> into your gates, <WH8179> as men enter <WH3996> into a city <WH5892> in which is made a breach. <WH1234>

With the hoofs <WH6541> of his horses <WH5483> shall he tread down <WH7429> all your streets; <WH2351> he shall kill <WH2026> your people <WH5971> with the sword; <WH2719> and the pillars <WH4676> of your strength <WH5797> shall go down <WH3381> to the ground. <WH776>

They shall make a spoil <WH7997> of your riches, <WH2428> and make a prey <WH962> of your merchandise; <WH7404> and they shall break down <WH2040> your walls, <WH2346> and destroy <WH5422> your pleasant <WH2532> houses; <WH1004> and they shall lay <WH7760> your stones <WH68> and your timber <WH6086> and your dust <WH6083> in the midst <WH8432> of the waters. <WH4325>
I will cause the noise <WH1995> of your songs <WH7892> to cease; <WH7673> and the sound <WH6963> of your harps <WH3658> shall be no more heard. <WH8085>

I will make <WH5414> you a bare <WH6706> rock; <WH5553> you shall be a place <WH4894> for the spreading <WH4894> of nets; <WH2764> you shall be built <WH1129> no more: <WH3068> for I Yahweh have spoken <WH1696> it, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH3068> Yahweh. <WH136>

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3069> to Tyre: <WH6865> shall not the islands <WH339> shake <WH7493> at the sound <WH6963> of your fall, <WH4658> when the wounded <WH2491> groan, <WH602> when the slaughter <WH2027> is made <WH2026> in the midst of you? <WH8432>

Then all the princes <WH5387> of the sea <WH3220> shall come down <WH3381> from their thrones, <WH3678> and lay aside <WH5493> their robes, <WH4598> and strip off <WH6584> their embroidered <WH7553> garments: <WH899> they shall clothe <WH3847> themselves with trembling; <WH2731> they shall sit <WH3427> on the ground, <WH776> and shall tremble <WH2729> every moment, <WH7281> and be astonished at you. <WH8074>

They shall take up <WH5375> a lamentation <WH7015> over you, <WH559> and tell you, <WH6> How you are destroyed, who were inhabited <WH3427> by seafaring men, <WH3220> the renowned <WH1984> city, <WH5892> who was strong <WH2389> in the sea, <WH3220> she and her inhabitants, <WH3427> who caused <WH5414> their terror <WH2851> to be on all who lived there! <WH3427>
Now shall the islands <WH339> tremble <WH2729> in the day <WH3117> of your fall; <WH4658> yes, <WH339> the islands that are in the sea <WH3220> shall be dismayed <WH926> at your departure. <WH3318>

For thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> When I shall make <WH5414> you a desolate <WH2717> city, <WH5892> like the cities <WH5892> that are not inhabited; <WH3427> when I shall bring up <WH5927> the deep <WH8415> on you, <WH7227> and the great waters <WH4325> shall cover you; <WH3680>

then will I bring you down <WH3381> with those who descend <WH3381> into the pit, <WH953> to the people <WH5971> of old time, <WH5769> and will make you to dwell in the lower parts <WH8482> of the earth, <WH776> in the places <WH8482> that are desolate <WH2723> of old, <WH5769> with those who go down <WH3381> to the pit, <WH953> that you be not inhabited; <WH3427> and I will set <WH5414> glory <WH6643> in the land <WH776> of the living: <WH2416>

I will make <WH5414> you a terror, <WH1091> and you shall no more have any being; <WH1245> though you are sought for, yet you will never <WH5769> be found <WH4672> again, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>
